mapper.sql: a.id_ AS "id", a.img_ AS "img", a.name_ AS "name", a.sex_ AS "sex", a.age_ AS "age", a.tel_ AS "tel", a.we_chat_ AS "weChat", a.login_name_ AS "loginName", a.password_ AS "password", a.school_ AS "school", a.class_r AS "classR", a.city_ AS "city", a.province AS "province", a.create_date_ AS "createDate", a.update_date_ AS "updateDate", a.remarks_ AS "remarks", a.del_flag_ AS "delFlag", a.blank_one_ AS "blankOne", a.blank_two_ AS "blankTwo"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM enguser a
AND a.name_ LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
SELECT a.ID_, a.NAME_, a.CREATE_DATE_, a.NUM_, (select count(1) from user_course uc where uc.USER_ID_ = #{id}) as course_num from enguser a WHERE a.ID_=#{id}
